title: Behavioral Finance Made Simple
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: I’ve yet to see a straightforward way of applying behavioral finance insights to investing. Are you supposed to have a checklist to make sure you’re not anchoring, herding or acting out of confirmation bias? I propose a simpler way of understanding what investing requires. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
